
{{alias}}
    The Euler-Mascheroni constant.

    The Euler-Mascheroni constant `gamma` (also known as "Euler's constant" or
    "the Euler constant") is defined as the limit of the sequence

                       /  __ n     1          \
    gamma  =  lim      | \         -  -  ln n |
                 n->oo \ /__ k = 1 k          /

    Examples
    --------
    > {{alias}}
    0.5772156649015329

    See Also
    --------
